name: Bunny Island
description:
Bunny Island

Your goal is to buy the 3 different cows the game offers (Pink, Green and Purple).

Bunny will plant carrots and tomatos to sell them at the store so he can buy 3 different cows to keep him company at the farm.

Controls:

"keyboard arrows" to move

Click and drag the crops (top left corner) through the growing zone to plant it

When finished just click the crops to harvest it

Walk to the store in the middle of the map (little basket with cart icon) to open the store where you can sell your crops and buy 3 different cows to keep you company

You can check your accurancy on the bottom right corner as well as the amount of carrots and tomatos you have in your inventory
